alert.note: Alert for Geary; Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 11:03PM CDT until April 14 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GEARY...EASTERN RILEY AND WESTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 1102 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Tuttle Creek Lake, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Westmoreland, Blaine, Ogden, Olsburg, Wheaton, Keats and Tuttle Creek Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 305 and 309. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to localized ponding of water on roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
